snippet.title: Melobot – A Last Song – Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Melobot on a marvellous musical adventure and awaken strange plants through the power of rhythm. Explore enchanted biomes, battle menacing machines and restore natural harmony. Play the score of a ruined world to awaken its soul.

Have you ever taken the time to listen?
Brace yourself for a whimsical musical adventure with Mélobot, your new favourite robot! In ‘A Last Song’, you'll explore a world that's both mysterious and threatening. Your mission? Awaken the strange flora and fauna of a silent planet with music, learn their unique melodies and hunt down the evil automatons.

You've got nine keys and a world to save - no pressure! Dance with the Meloplantes, the botanical stars of this wonderful world, and discover the melodies that tickle their leaves. Don't worry, you don't have to be Mozart - just feel the rhythm and play the melody to become a virtuoso.

Ready to plunge into a world buzzing with chaos and charm? Jump in the Melobase and zip through the biomes, a collection of wonderful landscapes. Explore the artefacts hidden throughout the world to piece together what happened to this desolate world.

Take on the fearsome Guardians, determined to silence the planet. Equip Melobot with an eclectic mix of instruments and turn the rebel machines into scrap metal with your harmonious heroic actions.
